channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Audi Q6 E-tron Review: Price, Specs, Availability
item.description: The first model on the brand’s new electric car platform, this ChatGPT-enabled EV SUV combines incredible comfort with possibly too much tech.

item.title: Anthropic looks to fund a new, more comprehensive generation of AI benchmarks
item.description: Anthropic is launching a program to fund the development of new types of benchmarks capable of evaluating the performance and impact of AI models, inc...

item.title: REI’s Fourth of July Sale Has Great Deals on Our Favorite Outdoor Gear
item.description: Whether you need a tent, sleeping pad, rain jacket, or new pack, REI’s Independence Day sale has something for everyone.

item.title: Senators urge owners, partners, and VC backers of fintech Synapse to restore customers’ access to their money
item.description: A group of senators has banded together to urge Synapse’s owners and bank and fintech partners to “immediately restore customers’ access to their mone...

item.title: The US Supreme Court Has Handed Big Tech a Big Gift
item.description: By shifting regulatory power away from government agencies and to the courts, recent SCOTUS rulings may be a boon for a tech industry under fire.

item.title: TechCrunch Space: Star spangled
item.description: Hello and welcome back to TechCrunch Space. I hope everyone has a fantastic July 4 this week. Go eat a hot dog. Read my story from last week on the ca...

item.title: Leading Lab-Grown Meat Company Cuts Dozens of Jobs
item.description: Upside Foods is slashing staff, citing legislative, regulatory, and funding headwinds.

item.title: Spotify tests emergency alerts in Sweden

item.title: These Are the Best VR Headsets, Accessories, Apps, and Games to Work and Play in the Metaverse
item.description: Diving into virtual reality is easier than ever—but here are a few key things to know.

item.title: YouTube now lets you request removal of AI-generated content that simulates your face or voice
